item.title: 🚣 Why I am pursuing the bootstrap journey
item.description: Why I am pursuing the bootstrap journey In 2010 I stepped into the doors of an advertising agency for my first junior full-time position and I was sparkling full of energy and enthusiasm. “Work Hard Play Hard” I lived and breathed the mantra for the next 7 years. I was working an unhealthy amount of hours, neglected my friends and family, fueled by the idealistic view that the next title and promotion will finally bring me happiness and justify the unpaid over hours.

item.title: 💡 Betalist Launch: Here are the stats for ViTAL
item.description: Launching on Betalist is different from Product Hunt. With Betalist you send out your application and the team reviews your submission. In case you get approved, you have 3 options: 1: “Funded” Cost $299 USD no waiting queue and get featured as soon as the next day. 2: “Startup” Cost $129 USD no the waiting queue and get featured within the next few days. 3: “Hobby” Cost Free waiting of up to one month.

item.title: 🌱February: Micro Startup #2
item.description: Finally started working on my February Micro Startup. After being done scratching my own itch, market research, audience analysis and talking to people from my audience in IRL over the last 2 weeks I wrote the first lines of code for 🌱📚❤️ VeganBookBase.com. Took me 3 Minutes and I am currently running through hundreds of Vegan Books, so every minute is valuable. As my priority is to learn on the go, I am not using a Website Builder on the main page.

item.title: 📽️ The influence of internet videos on my path to indie hacking
item.description: In autumn 2019 I started thinking about different product ideas and noticed all talk and no walk will not get me anywhere. That is when I started learning about building products and how to actually create things for the web. I started out learning as much as I can about all kinds of things like NoCode Tools, UX, UI, read books and enrolled in all kinds of online classes, communites, forums, subreddits and, of course, Youtube rabbit holes.

item.title: 🚀 One Micro Start Up Per Month #1
item.description: Note: The initial version was sent out to my newsletter recipients on the 31std of January 2021. This version has some slight adjustements. Welcome to the first issue of 🚀 One Micro Startup Per Month The last weeks have been quite an adventurous ride for me. On the day I launched my January product I had a power cut in my house. Yeah, a real one. Didn’t charge my laptop over night - 30% battery.

item.title: 👋 Welcome
item.description: Hi, I’m the Future Founder I will publish my articles here every other day. More info on the aboutpage. Enjoy & talk to soon. FF

item.title: Who is the Future Founder and what is this site?
item.description: Greetings, my friend from the world wide web. This website is the result of me failing at publishing online on a regular basis. I often faced many struggles with (old) new publishing technologies, which got in my way of just writing and publishing. That is why I have re-thought the way in which I bring things online. This website makes it easy to just write & publish. No bloated add ons, ads, extension or other things that get in your and my way.
